description.S2: evidently dropped a rare, limited-edition Spacer's Choice cigarette case during a scrap with raptidons.
description.S3: She'd be thrilled to get it back

blurb.B1: You can meet Lillian by the exit of the Covert Lab and talk to her.
blurb.B2: Lillian is an outlaw who has been hired by Cassandra O'Malley to keep watch for Auntie Cleo reinforcements outside the Covert Lab.
blurb.B3: She is on a break and will speak to the Stranger rather than shooting on sight like the other outlaws.
blurb.B5: she will explain that she was near the Raptidon Pens when the raptidons got loose and,
blurb.B8: She's happy to pay a reward if it is returned to her but doesn't expect anyone to go retrieve it for her,
blurb.B9: due to the danger involved in doing so.
blurb.B10: The quest is started when the Stranger says that they will go take a look for it.

description.S1: Lillian said she dropped her cigarette case in an outdoor raptidon pen.
description.S2: Follow the road southeast from her position.

blurb.B1: The Raptidon Pens are located south of the Covert Lab where Lillian is stationed.
blurb.B2: Lillian's cigarette case is located on a crate inside the pen which is inhabited by hostile raptidons.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: Hey there. You the fella Cass called about?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You're part of her group?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Who's asking?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: She didn't mention having anyone out here.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: That I am. Got left out here to watch for reinforcements. Name's Lillian.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: Hope you're having a better time than us.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Bad day, huh?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Cassandra's kind of a hard case, isn't she?

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: I've had better. Lost some things in a dust up. But I didn't get eaten like some of our crew. Got that going for me.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm sorry. Were they friends of yours?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What'd you lose?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: "So long as you've got your health..."

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: Some of them were okay. You don't get too close in this work. And Dylan, well, ain't no one gonna regret his passing. Least of all his mama.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: I was near the raptidon pen when they got loose. Had to set a few to rights. When I got to checking if all my parts were still attached, I realized I'd dropped my cigarette case.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Why didn't you go back and get it?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I know where this is going. You're "busy," but if I fetched it, you'd pay for my trouble. Right?

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: When I turned about, I seen two fine gunhands being snacked on by lizards. No cigarette case is worth my life. No matter how badly I need a smoke.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: This was a Spacer's Choice commemorative case. Some promo for Founding Day they did back in... I forget the year. Worth decent bits to collectors.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll come around if I can get hold of it.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Where did you lose your cigarettes?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Let's say I manage to nab it. You willing to pay to get it back?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You don't actually expect me to fetch it. Do you?

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'd be obliged. Just don't lose any parts trying.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: An outdoor raptidon pen yonder, past the main entrance. Law only knows why they're breeding the damn things.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: Well you'd sure as hell have earned it, wouldn't you?

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: Good Law, no. Just needed to vent, and you're the only one hereabouts.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: Though if you do happen to get a hold of it, I'll be setting here a spell.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: On second thought, it wouldn't hurt to at least look into it. I'll let you know if I can get a hold of it.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll take my leave, then.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: I look busy to you? It's surrounded by pissed-off raptidons. My mama didn't raise no dumbasses.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: My damn cigarettes for one thing.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: My dad used to say that, 'fore he "left the workforce."

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: Definitely got something large and uncomfortably-shaped up her nethers. Yammering on about rights and privileges and whatall. I'm like, "Lady, just sing out when you want something shot."

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: Leastways her pamphlets make good kindling.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: Relax, I ain't with Auntie. I'm one of Cassandra's gunhands. Name's Lillian.

dialog.speaker: Lillian (Female)
dialog.utterance: I was left out here as a picket. Name's Lillian.
